titles: The sinners conuersion. By Henrie Smith
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publisher: Printed [by Peter Short] for William Leake, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane,
notes: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.i."; the last leaf is blank.
Another edition has "william Leake" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
